title: Thousands of Italians attend medieval 'Battle of the Oranges'
text:
Thousands of Italians attend medieval 'Battle of the Oranges' 5:54pm GMT - 00:42 
Italians in the northern city of Ivrea marked carnival season on Sunday (February 11) with the annual 'Battle of the Oranges'. It's an event where people pit against each other for a mediaeval citrus bash. (Rough cut - no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Italians in the northern city of Ivrea marked carnival season on Sunday (February 11) with the annual 'Battle of the Oranges'. It's an event where people pit against each other for a mediaeval citrus bash.
